description.message: Eagle logs and prompts deletion of personally identifiable information (PII) in websites/web services that the user subscribes to.

detailed_description.message: Eagle logs personally identifiable information (PII) of user behavior in logging into websites and web services. Eagle keeps track of websites and web services that the user subscribes to and allows quick access to the information. Eagle also prompts the user to deal with websites and web services where the user isn't active to prevent PII theft.
detailed_description.description: The extension detailed description used in the developer dashboard.
